title: Speaking the Truth in Love to Teens
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Jessie Minassian
itunes:summary:
Your words can strengthen your long-term relationship with your teen or push them away. John and Danny offer advice on correcting teens in love.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the "Launch Into the Teen Years Kit": https://store.focusonthefamily.com/launch-into-the-teen-years-kit#refcd=1060302

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/speaking-the-truth-in-love-to-teens/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
